PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Realizadas na Semana
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO and A.DATACONCLUSAO BETWEEN @SEMANA[1] AND @SEMANA[2] </CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividades</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Realizadas na Semana</Description> <Icon>fa fa-cog fa-spin</Icon> <Color>green-jungle</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Pendentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < @HOJE</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesPendentes</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Pendentes</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>red</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades para hoje
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO >= DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE()),0) AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesHoje</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades para hoje</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>yellow-gold</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Futuras
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO > @HOJE</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesFuturas</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Futuras</Description> <Icon>fa fa-line-chart</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Suportes em Aberto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_CHAMADOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIOINCLUSAO = @USUARIO AND A.STATUS IN (1)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MEUS_CHAMADOS</CommandName> <Value>HANDLE</Value> <Description>Suportes em Aberto</Description> <Icon>fa fa-list</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Minhas Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.ARQUITETO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(V.HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V LEFT JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAEQUIPEOPORTUNIDADE E ON E.OPORTUNIDADE = A.HANDLE LEFT JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADESPROD P ON P.OPORTUNIDADE = A.HANDLE JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE AND (E.USUARIO = @USUARIO OR P.ARQUITETOSOLUCAO = @USUARIO))</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_FILIAL</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Minhas Oportunidades</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>default</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Vencidas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.ARQUITETO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.DATAFECHAMENTO < GETDATE() AND A.STATUSOPORTUNIDADE NOT IN (7,14,15,16,17,18,19,20) AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT DISTINCT(V.HANDLE) FROM K_CRM_VERTICAL V LEFT JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAEQUIPEOPORTUNIDADE E ON E.OPORTUNIDADE = A.HANDLE LEFT JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADESPROD P ON P.OPORTUNIDADE = A.HANDLE JOIN STRING_SPLIT ((SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(K_VERTICALPRODUTO,0, LEN(K_VERTICALPRODUTO)-1), '|', ''),'_',',') FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO), ',') ON VALUE = V.HANDLE AND (E.USUARIO = @USUARIO OR P.ARQUITETOSOLUCAO = @USUARIO))</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_VENCIDAS_FILIAL</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Vencidas</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>red</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>
